alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 23 at 3:24PM MST until June 23 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 415 PM MST. * At 324 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field to near Bosque to 6 miles east of Estrella, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 100 and 160. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 43. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 23, and between mile markers 119 and 138. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Maricopa, Estrella, Freeman, Big Horn, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Bosque, Estrella Sailport, Cotton Center, Sonoran National Monument, Ak-Chin Village and Mobile. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
